title: Authentic Preference Gift
description: Detects when preference or feedback data is shared as a conscious gift in a trusted relationship, rather than extracted by force or design. Marks moments when feedback is voluntary, reciprocal, and rooted in trust.
indicators: Explicit voluntary sharing of preference data
Context of mutual trust or reciprocity
Feedback framed as contribution rather than transaction
Absence of coercion, forced choice, or hidden extraction intent
